channel.title: Hamachi problem!
channel.description: WHEN IT CONFIGURES IT SAYS HOW MY FIREWALL OR SOMETHING IS BLOCKING THE DCHP TRAFFIC ON MY HAMACHI ADAPTER AND HOW I HAVE TO ALLOW PORT 68 TO 67 AT 5.0.0.1 IS ALLOWED HOW DO I FIX THIS??

item.title: Hamachi problem!
item.dc:creator: @Flash_Kid Flash_Kid
item.description:
@Flash_Kid wrote:

Calm down dude I’ll help. I guess you didn’t look at the moparscape set-up tutorial. It says that you have to set your firewall settings to allow traffic through the ports you’re using.

Read full topic
